data.title: Paramount Health Services & Insurance TPA Pvt. Ltd.
data.text:
Dear Ameeta and Suresh,

I hope you're doing well.

I would like to appreciate the continuous support provided by Komal Madeshwar. She always takes ownership of her work and proactively responds to the emails and calls even in the non office hours. For reference- Yesterday's cashless claim, she has supported till midnight which is highly appreciated for her immense dedication. Being a new joinee, she has picked up very quickly and proved herself that she has a zeal to learn and work hard which will help her to grow in her career successfully. So keep doing good work and I wish you all the best !!

Jyoti Bala

Alyve Health

Dear Komal,

I wanted to take this opportunity to provide a detailed feedback for Komal Madeshwar. I am a holder of the IIT Kanpur Alumni Group Policy for my parents and have been visiting Max Hospital (previously known as Sahara), Lucknow since January, 2024 for my mother’s treatment and dialysis.

The hospital is still struggling with the processes and the employees are not very proactive when it comes to serving their patients / clients. I have had multiple issues such as delayed claim submissions and approvals, or lack of responsibility/ownership on their part.

It was after a few weeks that I got the contact of Komal which was the true game changer. Komal has been exceptional in her responsibilities and has been thoroughly proactive in her deliverables. She is always available on phone and helps me liaise to understand if the hospital actually submitted the required documents and bills or not.

The prompt response and communication helps with a timely discharge for my mom, which otherwise after 4 hours of dialysis is an added pain to wait for approvals/discharge formalities.

Overall, Komal has been a tremendous support who takes her work with utmost sincerity and delivers over and above her duties. She has always been responsive and even helped us while on leave/vacation. She has brought back a positive belief for me in the policy and she is definitely an asset for any organization.

I want to thank Komal for her help and support and wish her the very best in her future endeavours

Harsh Srivastava

Dear Komal,

Thanks a lot for your continuous support in getting my claims settled with minimum hassles. Timely payment really helps to manage the subsequent treatment bills. You must be dealing with so many patients but I really appreciate the way you listen patiently to my issues and get them addressed with urgency.

I must say that in past one year my experience in dealing the mediclaim process with TPA like Paramount has been excellent. My sincere thanks to you for all your coordination with your backend team and seniors.

Kapil

Hi Sanvi,

Thank you so much for helping me with making my hospital experience so comfortable. I Really appreciate your patience when you came with me for my Mom’s cashless Dialysis papers & now with my dad hospitalisation. Love your dedication towards Your Job !!

You have attended to all my call at any time of the day & answered each & every bit of my queries with patience & understanding … appreciate every bit of your help !!

A Big heartfelt thank you for always being there & making it easier for me to concentrate on well being of my parents … Your One liner “Don’t worry I will get it done" brings a Big relief to me every time we speak ! Thanks Saima & Jimmy for helping as well !!! Feels like I got my back covered with you Guys watching out on everything going so smoothly !!!

Renuka Hardasani

Retail Administration | Management | Bestseller.com

Dear Mr. Abhishek,

I am writing to express my sincere gratitude for the exceptional service you provided during my recent interactions with Paramount Health Services. Your professionalism, attention to detail, and genuine care made a significant difference in my experience.

From the moment I reached out, you were attentive, responsive, and went above and beyond to address my concerns and ensure that I received the best possible care. Your dedication and expertise were evident in every interaction, and I felt truly valued as a customer.

Thank you for your outstanding service. It is rare to find someone who combines such a high level of competence with genuine kindness and empathy. You have made a lasting positive impression, and I am grateful for your assistance.

Ganpat Koyande

Dear Jobin,

I hope you are doing well.

I am Geetha, working at Deloitte, Hyderabad, as an Associate Director in T&T: ET&P - SAP Practice. In March 2024, I was diagnosed with thyroid cancer. Since then, life has been a roller coaster, with four hospital admissions in the past two months for various treatments, from surgeries to radiations.

Throughout this challenging time, the support I have received from the insurance team has been tremendous. Your team has been consistently available for my queries, and the claims processing has been incredibly quick—less than two hours for all four of my claims. It has never been a hassle for me. 🙂

I truly appreciate the dedication and efficiency of your team. Their efforts have made a significant difference in my experience during this difficult period.

Geetha Madhuri Bobbili,

SAP Data & Analytics Associate Director | Deloitte South Asia LLP

Hi Santosh Pevekar,

On 11 Jan 2023 I underwent surgery before which I was approved with 4 lakhs of cashless amount. However after surgery I was approved 2.18 lakhs only. I escalated the issue with Pravin Jagtap how never helped me in anyway (Never answered my phone calls, Never replied my WhatsApp, etc.). He just dragged the issue with no resolution for several months!!!

Our company insurance policy renewed and I came across with the new coordinator SANTOSH PEVEKAR. He proactively worked on my case and understood what am going through. I received the amount as below which I never expected from the insurance company.

I literally appreciated his ethical work, expertise and dedication. I must say that SANTOSH PEVEKAR IS AN ASSET TO THE COMPANY!!!

Thank you so much Santosh Pevekar for your help and keep up the good work!

Kunal Sindroja,

Interactive Brokers India PVT LTD

Hi Abhishek,

Thank you so much for your smooth services provided for the Claim No: 6702359.

I am writing to express my sincere appreciation for the exceptional service provided by your team during my recent medical treatment.

I must commend your team for their efficiency, professionalism, and dedication to ensuring a seamless experience for your policyholders. From the moment hospital team contacted customer service team to initiate the claim process to the final settlement of the claim, every step was handled with utmost care and attention to detail.

The entire process was remarkably smooth and hassle-free, thanks to the clear communication, prompt responses, and proactive assistance provided by your staff.

Please extend my heartfelt gratitude to everyone involved in ensuring the success of the cashless claim process. Once again, thank you for your outstanding service. I look forward to continuing my relationship with your company and will not hesitate to recommend your services to others in need of reliable medical insurance coverage.

Rins John,

Associate Director | Risk Advisory| Cyber Risk Services | Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu India LLP

Hi Team Uttam,

This is an appreciation email for the insurance benefits that KPMG has provided its employees with and the Insurance team Uttam for the support they provided.

I recently had an experience wherein I used this benefit and I can tell you it is one of the very good employee benefits that KPMG has provided us with. This insurance policy is very comprehensive compared to the what is available in the market.

This serves as a financial cushion in times of need for us and helps take off some burden in those tough times. Certain things I observed that stand out are:

The maternity cover amount is very good. You don’t get this cover or you get very less cover in the market.

The 0 waiting period is very helpful

All pre conditions are covered by default which helps cover individuals with certain past illness. Again market only covers some of these that also with waiting periods.

Well baby charges are also covered in maternity.

Day 1 coverage for new born again helps a lot. No policy in the market covers this. They only cover a new born from Day 91.

Documents collection, Information sharing and query resolution (via Phone and Email) support from the Insurance SPOCS Uttam has been very good. I even reached out to them on a Sunday for help and got it.

The claims (both cashless and reimbursement) were processed timely and with transparency of deductions.

Himanshu Jain,

KPMG

Hi Tanuja,

I hope this email finds you well.

I wanted to take a moment to express my sincere gratitude for your assistance throughout the claim refund process. Your support and prompt action made the entire procedure smooth and hassle-free for me. I am pleased to inform you that I have received the claim amount without any issues.

Your professionalism and attention to detail truly made a difference, and I am thankful for your dedication in ensuring that everything was handled efficiently. Once again, thank you so much for your invaluable assistance. I genuinely appreciate your efforts and commendable service.

Vivian Paul,

Team Leader - Operations | Hexaware BPS

Hi Rahul / Haresh,

I wanted to extend my heartfelt gratitude to each and every one of you for your invaluable assistance throughout my recent surgery process. Thanks to your support, my surgery was successfully completed without any complications.

I am particularly grateful for the seamless handling of my insurance approval. Your timely actions ensured that I could focus on my health without any added stress or worry. This experience with your company has been incredibly positive, and I sincerely appreciate the professionalism and efficiency demonstrated by your team.

It's reassuring to know that there are people like you who genuinely understand the importance of providing support during challenging times. Your dedication to your work and compassion for your clients truly make a difference.

Once again, thank you all for your outstanding assistance. I am deeply grateful for everything you have done for me.

Vivian Paul,

Team Leader - Operations | Hexaware BPS

Hello Sangeeta,

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to take a moment to express my sincerest gratitude for the exceptional service you provided in assisting us with adding our newborn baby to our insurance policy. Your prompt and efficient handling of our request was truly remarkable, and we are immensely grateful for your efforts.

Your assistance made a significant difference during what could have been a stressful time for us. Your professionalism and dedication ensured that the approval process was completed swiftly.

Your commitment to customer service is commendable and greatly appreciated. It is evident that you take pride in your work and go above and beyond to assist your clients. Your responsiveness and attention to detail have not gone unnoticed, and we are truly thankful for your support.

Once again, thank you for your outstanding service. We are grateful to have you as our insurance SPOC and look forward to continuing our relationship with your esteemed company.

Sabesh & Mohana,

Dear Gagan,

I trust this message finds you well. I am writing to express my sincere gratitude for your invaluable assistance and unwavering support throughout the recent insurance claim process.

Your proactive involvement not only streamlined the complexities of the claim but also contributed significantly to making the entire experience considerably more manageable for me. Your dedication and professionalism did not go unnoticed, and I am truly grateful for your efforts.

Additionally, I want to extend my appreciation for your compassionate approach during a challenging time. Your availability for hospital-related inquiries and the genuine care you demonstrated were reminiscent of a supportive family member, providing much-needed comfort during the tough days of hospitalization for my mother.

Once again, thank you for your exceptional service and genuine concern. Your commitment to excellence has made a lasting positive impact.

Vaibhav Deshpande,

Sr. Director | Enterprise Architecture and Strategy | Gartner India

Dear All,

This mail comes as a special thanks to the entire Paramount team for their fast-track services on insurance -Pre auth to cashless to post hospital claims etc. A special mention to MS Jyoti Maurya for her unending support extended during my father’s hospitalization in last 1 year. As I am based out of Bangalore and my parents are in hometown Kanpur, coordination on the insurance becomes very tensed exercise for me and such times I look forward to the TPA services. I must admit that in the last 1 year, my father was hospitalized for 3 times and MS Jyoti stepped in with her updates, support and did everything which could put me to ease and help move the request fast for approval.

Her assurance and her availability to answer my queries has really helped me and family a lot and have the best experience of Insurance coverage for my parents.

I wish MS Jyoti and the entire TPA team a very best .This human touch ,timely help ,regular updates, and full-on support has really helped my family .

Mamta Srivastava,

Global Delivery Learning Lead-Applications Service Line | DXC

Dear Ayush & Team,

I would like to thank you so much for all your kind support during the last week emergency.

It was really very much help full that you made it to maximum amount as cash less for which on total amount of 405018 we paid about 27,000.

Really appreciated and am happy with the service you provided. Also looking forward with same in future if any.

Roselien Helen,

Senior Travel Counselor | TRAVELER CARE SINGAPORE | AMERICAN EXPRESS GLOBAL BUSINESS TRAVEL

Hi Prasoon,

I would like to extend my gratitude and thanks for all the help and prompt response which has been received by you and team Paramount helpdesk while processing my mother and my child’s hospitalization claims.

Both happened in the non-cashless hospitals but I have experienced zero problem in getting my claim processed later, I think in less than 10 days or may be less, which was beyond my expectation.

Thanks much for the quick turnaround.

Ginny Chawla,

Optum

Dear Ms Aditya Babu,

I hope this email finds you in good health. I am writing to express my heartfelt gratitude for your invaluable assistance during the recent claim settlement process. Your dedication and expertise have had a significant impact on me, and I am sincerely grateful for your unwavering support.

Your attention to detail, prompt responses, and thorough guidance have expedited the settlement process and alleviated much of the stress associated with it. Your commitment to excellence and professionalism sets a commendable standard.

I am grateful for the time and effort you have put in to ensure a smooth and efficient resolution. Your expertise has been instrumental, and your kindness in addressing our concerns has not gone unnoticed.

Once again, I thank you for going above and beyond in assisting me through this process. Your exemplary service has undoubtedly left a positive impression, and I am grateful to work with someone of your calibre.

I wish you continued success in your endeavours.

Warm regards,

Ashwin,

PM - Talent (Emp. Experience) | Piramal School of Leadership, India.

Hi Suraj Balan,

My mom was recently diagnosed with 4th stage colon cancer and had to undergo a surgery at Jupiter hospital , Thane. It was an unplanned one and she had to be operated on in less than 24 hours to save her life.

The initial approval took very long and I had to pay 1.25 lacs as a deposit as Jupiter kept saying that Paramount was taking too long to send the initial approval. In the meantime, I reached out to Suraj Balan via my Senior HR manager, Nikita Sarangi and from then on, Suraj followed up and ensured that all approvals were given asap. He also stayed in touch with me during her stay and ensured that the final approval for discharge was given without delays.

He is also still in touch with me as her chemotherapy is ongoing and is always quick to respond to my messages and approvals. I would like to appreciate him and thank him for the same.

I was disappointed with the time taken for initial approval though, it took almost 48 hours and there is definite scope for improvement as not everyone will be able to pay such a huge amount as a deposit failing which the hospital holds up critical surgeries.

@Nikita Sarangi Thank you for your help and intervention as well.

@Suraj Balan Thanks for your help & quick responses. She still has 4 more chemo sessions to go through and I am counting on your continued support.

Ms. Dawn Young,

Communications | Colgate

Dear Gagan,

I trust this message finds you well. I am writing to express my sincere gratitude for your invaluable assistance and unwavering support throughout the recent insurance claim process.

Your proactive involvement not only streamlined the complexities of the claim but also contributed significantly to making the entire experience considerably more manageable for me. Your dedication and professionalism did not go unnoticed, and I am truly grateful for your efforts.

Additionally, I want to extend my appreciation for your compassionate approach during a challenging time. Your availability for hospital-related inquiries and the genuine care you demonstrated were reminiscent of a supportive family member, providing much-needed comfort during the tough days of hospitalization for my mother.

Once again, thank you for your exceptional service and genuine concern. Your commitment to excellence has made a lasting positive impact.

Regards,

Vaibhav Deshpande,

Sr. Director | Enterprise Architecture and Strategy | Gartner India

Dear Mahender,

I am writing this mail to express my gratitude and appreciation for the support that you have provided me for my insurance process. You have shown at most commitment and sincerity in extending your support when I needed it the most. Like any other insurance user, I was most sceptical about the service that I would receive during my hospitalisation but unlike my expectations you have ensured that all my requests were addressed timely. People like you would change a person's notions about insurance and its workings that Paramount TPA is always there to help and assist. I would also like to appreciate the time that you have taken out of your Sunday to respond to my calls and guide me in the right direction. I hope you and wish you all the very best for your carrier at Paramount TPA and wish to see you growing higher in your role. May this year be filled with joy and happiness for you and your family.

Fahad A Nizar,

Michelin

Hi Dushyant,

Thanks for your note and I confirm that all of my claims have been processed.

I would also like to take a moment here to recognize the help that you have extended to make the process hassle free and super smooth. Your proactiveness in communicating the actions required to status updates was no less than perfect. Insurance claim processes are always seen as cumbersome and time consuming however your assistance made it super easy. From hereon you will be my go to person at Paramount. Your team is lucky to have you 😊

Thanks again for all your help – Cheers!

Pranav Trivedi,

Rio Tinto

Dear Preethi and the Banglore PHS with the Paramount TPA Team,

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to express my deepest gratitude for the outstanding support and dedication you have demonstrated in resolving a long-term stretched insurance settlement issue.

Your tireless efforts, attention to detail, and relentless pursuit of a resolution have not only alleviated the stress associated with the prolonged settlement process but have also showcased a level of professionalism and commitment that truly sets you apart.

Throughout the entire journey, Preethi, you have consistently exhibited exceptional communication skills, keeping me informed at every step of the way. Your ability to navigate complex insurance procedures and your proactive approach to addressing any challenges that arose were truly commendable.

The Banglore PHS and The Paramount TPA team's collaborative spirit and cohesive efforts have played a pivotal role in expediting the resolution of this matter. It is evident that your team operates with a customer-centric mindset, and the positive impact of your collective efforts has not gone unnoticed.

I want to express my sincere appreciation for the high level of competence and empathy displayed by Preethi and the entire The Banglore PHS and The Paramount TPA team. Your commitment to excellence has not only restored my faith in the insurance process but has also left a lasting positive impression.

Thank you once again for going above and beyond in delivering exceptional service. I look forward to continuing any future insurance-related endeavors with the confidence that I am in capable hands.

Anil Pawar,

Senior Backend Engineer | Ecosystem | Pi | Titans

Hi Team,

My experiences with Paramount have always been exceptional. From the time the patient was admitted until they were discharged, Paramount made sure that everything went smoothly. I want to thank Hema for her understanding of the urgency of the situation and for helping me to speed up the approval and other processes. Of course, special thanks and kudos go to Shrini, who has always supported and helped me throughout the entire process.

Himanshu,

Lead- Senior Software Engineer | Optum

I want to convey my deepest gratitude to Vimla Gupta Mam, Mr. Ashish Bisht and Team for helping me out in resolving my mother’s insurance top up and claim issue very quickly with proper communication delivery and information regarding the same which helped me in handling hospital TPA dept.

I specially want to thank Mr. Ashish Bisht who went beyond his capacities to cooperate with my issue even on the day of his holiday. It helped me a lot.

Dear Sudipta,

Despite of my documents reaching your office late, you made happen a turnaround clearance within 20 minutes which is highly appreciated and never have in my experience seen such a dedicated proactive support and handholding during such difficult time.

I would call out to the seniors marked on this email to please recognize her as she is truly a valued talent that you have, she has displayed both work excellence and at the same time had patience and empathy ensuring it’s a good experience for the end customer.

Assistant Vice President - (HR) | HRMUSTER Technologies | Management | Transformation

I just want to thank you from bottom of my heart. Not just helping me for reimbursement but also for hearing me when I was angry. Without your involvement, I would have just fighting with paramount team whether they have received my document or not. You made everything simple for me.

Optum

As you are aware, I was hospitalized for a minor surgery and had opted for a cashless insurance claim. I must say that your guidance and support during the claim process made it a lot easier for me and my family. Your timely response to all my queries and the proactive approach you took in ensuring that the claim was processed quickly is truly commendable.

Sagar Dudhanikar,

Infineon Technologies India Pvt. Ltd.

I wanted to take a moment to express my sincere gratitude for all of your help in getting my insurance policy in place on time. Your dedication and hard work to ensure that everything was processed quickly and efficiently were greatly appreciated. I truly appreciate the time and effort you took to answer all of my questions and concerns, and your willingness to go above and beyond to make sure that everything was taken care of. Your commitment to providing excellent customer service is truly commendable, and I am grateful to have had the opportunity to work with you. Thank you again for your outstanding efforts and for making the insurance process a smooth and stress-free experience.

Priyanka,

DXC Technology

Hello Team,

I was informed timely every time on the status of the claim. I was contacted for explaining the deficiency letter and required documents. Mr. Chandramouli was providing excellent support in explaining the process and helping me with details whenever required. I have never seen such a polite and respectful healthcare executive in previous TPAs I have worked with. I appreciate all the efforts to keep the process simple and smooth. I thank you for all the support and the work you do.

Optum

This is in regard to the cashless claim that I had initiated for my mother’s hospitalization for the bilateral Total Knee Replacement surgery. Optum

Then I contacted Hari and he gracefully & timely helped me with all the details. He was patient in listening to me and was very understanding. But while discharging was when I was extremely happy/delighted because he not only looked at the Claims closely but also indicated me that they are charging me extra 35k. And when I enquired and Hari personally spoke to the Billing department and solved the excess charges that was asked to be paid OOP. I am extremely Thankful to Hari, who was helping me through-out this experience. Thank You Hari \uD83D\uDE0A and Paramount Team.

Uday Tiruvanallur,

Optum

I really appreciate the quick and personized support I got from Mr. Sunil Dutt. It is already a very difficult times when a person requires insurance claims and getting this kind of amazing support from people like him really helps you to fight back with ease.

We should definitely have people like him in the support team who can help you getting your claim processed at the earliest which is a much need of that time. Thank you again for your incredible assistance.

Mr. Nitin Bansal,

AMS Bid Manager - DXC Technology

A very big Thank You to Members of H and A Policy Depth. of AMC with reference to Shreya, Jhanavi, Chandani and also Rahul Kavle of Paramount Health Services and of course my Dear Friend Dr. Nayan Shah.

I have no words how to appreciate and thank you all for the financial services offered to me on an urgent basis to have my surgery in time and later settling the Hospital bill promptly which enabled me to take leave of the hospital on the 3rd day of my surgery. May God Almighty Bless You All.

Dr. Dilip S. Naik.

ASSOC. OF MEDICAL CONSULTANTS

I would like to share my experience with the below TPA members who inspired me and my family with their timely actions. Sunil, Kamlesh and Vijay Tiwari, It was a heart breaking moment for us to get my son admitted in the hospital for a surgery and the above TPA members were empathetic, compassionate and their human touch in what they did in processing my cashless claim in a quick manner was truly awesome. They were very supportive in processing my claim and their responses were swift which helped me to have a smooth discharge with a very good experience. I want to express my personal gratitude for their genuine efforts, flexibility and willingness to assist anytime which contributed to this experience especially when we go through such highly emotional moments in our life. I congratulate the organization for having such members who are empathetic and skilful who work beyond the call of duty to achieve customer ecstasy. They are truly an asset to the organization and it is important to recognize them. Please pass on my sincere appreciations to each one of them and I congratulate the organization for having such employees.

Regards,

Manager, HR Shared Services, Onboarding Team

DXC Technology

Very good morning. Especially a very special thanks to Benny Mudaliyar – our CRM from Paramount who has always been available whenever the situation demanded me to talk to her for her guidance and support Though being a holiday, It was only with Benny’s quick help and support on Sunday last (11th sept) that we could ensure the timely discharge for my Mother from Apollo Hosp post her Angioplasty procedure.

Best regards,

Atos IT CIO Office

Sales Manager

KPG

Please treat this mail as “Customer Delight” feedback for your services. Keep it up and all the best.

Thanks & Regards,

Sandeep Deshpande,

Group Head

Human Resource & Administration

Dear Ashley,

I would like to thank you for the excellent and prompt service provided by you from 10th to 13 th March 2022. I appreciate the way you communicated and fulfilled the commitment of providing the approval in 10-15 minutes after understanding my problem, while in other companies executives have asked to wait for 2 hours for approval. I also value the way you called back and confirmed whether I received the approval mail or not. You were very courteous, helpful and friendly. Your company should be proud to have an asset like you. Thanks & Regards,

Uday Rane,

Asst. Manager- Graphic Design

Transasia Bio-Medicals Ltd.

Dear Rohit,

I just wanted to drop in a quick line to thank you for your stellar efforts over the last weekend. I was in distress, to say the least when my mother-in-law suffered a Grade 4 subarachnoid brain hemorrhage on Friday night. I was able to get through to contact numbers for Paramount very late at night and I think I would have called you at 3 AM. Kapil Sharma

Vice President | Head of Business Delivery | Private Clients, Barclays

This was my first experience with them and I was really nervous about the claim process. The continuous support given by you helped me get through the process without any problems. Software Engineer, Gartner Inc.

Special call out to Karan and Amit for making this happen. Thank you once again from the bottom of my heart.

Ritesh Agarwal

Director Strategic Accounts | Ciena

Hi Aashish,

I greatly appreciate what you and the other Paramount staff did for the settlement of all my medical claims. Initially, I thought the settlement process will take time after looking at the points given in deficiency letters but I was able to get them through with your support later on. Thanks to the team for providing the online option for submitting documents (on the Paramount portal), this made the settlement process easy in those difficult times. At a point in time, I was also not expecting to recover deducted amounts (Hospital discount/medical bill) but because of Paramount teams, continuous follow-up with the hospital the refund was possible for me. Excellent work!

Sachin Singhal

Advisor - Global Service Line – Fixed Assets & Reconciliation Group Services - Finance & Accounting Services

Dear Dr. Suman Ma'am,

Greetings from Zoom Insurance Brokers..!! We all know that there is a sudden surge in the number of COVID-19 cases in the past couple of weeks across most states. I would like to appreciate you & your team for an outstanding job and excellent effort in arranging oxygen beds for our Max life client’s employee on 28th Apr'21 in the need of the hour. We express our sincere gratitude to you and your team. Thank you for your cooperation. Thanks a lot for your kind help and support always. Looking forward to forging a strong relationship with you and your company.

Safrula

Director - Business Development, Zoom Insurance Brokers

Dear Ma’am,

We don’t have words for your efforts in doing more than what can be expected in these tough times. You have always been a support and been available for any help/suggestions I have personally banked upon. You are a marvelous human being and such gratitude which I am sure is just one of a case out of so many you and your team have been helping since the last couple of weeks and saved lives of so many that one cannot imagine. God bless you and your team for this terrific support. Take care of yourself as this is not the end and we all have to come over this situation and we too shall fight this time to see happy times again.

Mr. Ashish Jalan
